scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm test && npm run deploy-gh-pages
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: git clone --quiet https://$GH_USERNAME:$GH_TOKEN@github.com/${CONFIG_OWNER}/${CONFIG_REPO} ../build > /dev/null 2>&1 &&  cp -R _site/* ../build && cd ../build && git config user.email "$GIT_EMAIL" && git config user.name "$GIT_NAME" && git add -A . && git commit -a -m "Travis build $TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER." && git push --quiet origin master > /dev/null 2>&1
